Package vinyl

Class SelectAPI

java.lang.Object
vinyl.SelectAPI
public class SelectAPI extends Object
A configurator used to define a select operation on a record-stream. A select operation maps input records to output records.

Fields defined on the configurator (or any sub-configurators) become fields on a resultant header. The header fields are in order of definition on the configurator(s). A field may be redefined on the configurator(s), in which case its definition is replaced, but its original position in the header is retained.

See Also:
  • RecordStream.select(java.util.function.Consumer<vinyl.SelectAPI>)

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    SelectAPI.Fields<T>
    A sub-configurator used to define fields of a select operation that depend on a common intermediate result.
    class 
    SelectAPI.Window
    A sub-configurator used to define fields of a select operation in terms of analytic functions over partitions of the input stream.

    SelectAPI

    • fields

      public <T> SelectAPI fields(Function<? super Record,? extends T> mapper, Consumer<SelectAPI.Fields<T>> config)
      Configures a sub-configurator, that may define (or redefine) fields in terms of the result of applying the given function to each input record. If no fields are defined by the sub-configurator, possibly due to later field redefinitions, the entire sub-configurator is discarded.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the result type of the function
      Parameters:
      mapper - a function to apply to each input record
      config - a consumer of the sub-configurator
      Returns:
      this configurator

    • window

      public SelectAPI window(Consumer<SelectAPI.Window> config)
      Configures a sub-configurator, that may define (or redefine) fields as analytic functions over partitions of the input stream. If no fields are defined by the sub-configurator, possibly due to later field redefinitions, the entire sub-configurator is discarded.
      Parameters:
      config - a consumer of the sub-configurator
      Returns:
      this configurator
